document.title: The Rural Labor Force: Unemployment and Underemployment Issues
document.abstract: Public testimony by Prof. Briggs given before the Subcommittee on Agriculture and Transportation of the Joint Economic Committee, Ninety-ninth Congress, June 13, 1985.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation:
Briggs, V. (1985). The Rural Labor Force: Unemployment and Underemployment Issues. In The Economic Evolution of Rural America: Hearings Before the Subcommittee on Agriculture and Transportation of the Joint Economic Committee, Congress of the United States, Ninety-ninth Congress, pp. 226-239 (see also pp. 220-225). Washington, DC: U.S. Government Printing Office.
http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/briggstestimonies/9

file.description: The Economic Evolution of Rural America
